sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Cards/>
  <form-cards/>
</template>

<script>
import Cards from "@/components/Cards";
import FormCards from "@/components/FormCards";
export default {
  components: {
    Cards, FormCards,
  },
  data(){
    return{
      name: '',
      description: '',
      image: '',
      price: '',
      cards: [],
      disabled: true,
      }
    },
    methods: {
      add() {
        let newCard = {
          name: this.name,
          description: this.description,
          image: this.image,
          price: this.price,
        }
        this.cards.push(newCard);
        this.name = '';
        this.description = '';
        this.image = '';
        this.price = '';
      },
      deleteCard(cardRemove) {
        this.cards = this.cards.filter(t => t !== cardRemove)
      },
      color() {
        if (this.name.length && this.description.length && this.image.length && this.price.length) {
          return 'colorGreen';
        }
      },
      disable() {
        if (this.name.length && this.description.length && this.image.length && this.price.length) {
          return false
        }
        else return true
      },
      edit(elem){
        this.name = elem.name;
        this.description = elem.description;
        this.image = elem.image;
        this.price = elem.price;
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style src="./style.css"></style>
